input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item specification information.

Item specification:
Graduation Scene Backdrop - Size 6 Ft. X 6 Ft.

Item keywords:
Perfect for graduation party
Use it for your picture wall
Ready to Hang
Size - 6 ft x 6ft.
input_text.Response A: The Graduation Scene Backdrop is an exquisite piece that will add the perfect touch to any graduation party. This ready to hang backdrop is a full 6 feet by 6 feet, giving you plenty of space to take beautiful pictures. The backdrop is made of high-quality fabric that is durable and light-weight, making it easy to transport and set up. The beautiful graduation scene features a stunning background with a graduation cap, diploma, books, tassel, and more. The backdrop is perfect for taking pictures of your graduate, as well as creating a beautiful photo wall for all of your guests to enjoy. It's ready to hang, so there's no need for any assembly. Just unroll, hang it up, and start taking pictures!
input_text.Response B: This gorgeous graduation scene backdrop is perfect for decorating your party and taking great pictures. It is ready to hang and is a generous size of 6ft x 6ft.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: Response A is very marketing language style. Response B is good but doesn’t really add the marketing spin like response A does
